name: ROCm Release v5.1.0
body:
New since last release
cf92f64 Fixed some errors in rocminfo reported by lint tool
6b4d69d changeing major_ver of targetlist to decimal

name: rocm-5.0.1
body: No new commits in this release.

name: ROCm Release v5.0.0
body:
New since last release
a697eda Adding license file to rocminfo package
2b4b0c8 Add dependency on kmod.
8656004 Correct and simplify package dependencies.
e32a4d9 Don't touch CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS.
e1df81c Add a new rocm_agent_enumerator option '-name' which lists target names obtained from the output of rocminfo.
2bd7657 Adding package dependency
102f22f Append CXXFLAGS env. variable to CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS

body:

10da0a7 Exit earlier if prerquisites are not met
e7b43b9 Standardizing Package name

New in this release:

5d6be5b Refer explicitly to python3 in shebang line

name: ROCm release v3.1.0
body:
New since last release:
a134847 Added documentation for the new env var.
12736c6 Added env var to set target.lst
9b0cd9e Fix for running rocminfo on wider variety of CPUs
831f3ab Update README to include instruction to fetch git tags
2afaae2 Require >= CMake3.5 instead of 2.8

name: ROCm release v3.0.0
body: No changes from previous ROCm release.

name: ROCm release v2.9.0
body: No changes from v2.8.0

name: ROCm release v2.8.0
body:
Since previous ROCm release:
* Install to standard locations using GNUInstallDirs
* Update versioning to new uniform standards
* Use CACHE variables, allow overriding ROCR_LIB_DIR/ROCR_INC_DIR
* Messages indicating fatal errors should be fatal
* Fixed sizeof(err_val) to return the number of characters in the array

name: ROCm release v2.10.0
body: No changes from previous ROCm release.

name: ROCm release v2.6.0
body: * Modified CMakeLists.txt to generate .deb and .rpm packaging
